name: Personal Bubble
description:
Web GL not working. Please Download Dash through the skies as you compete among your bubble brothers. Be victorious and become bubble overlord! Inspired by games like Agar.io, Personal Bubble is a game in which you try to become the biggest bubble in the room Be careful though, the bigger you are the likelier you are to pop! Don’t run out of space! Personal Bubble is my first game jam project and I hope you enjoy it!

Tools Used

  • Unity Engine
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • Oculus Medium
  • Google SketchUp
  • Paint.net
